title: go.talks/present: can't view x.go file page
body:
On Win7/amd64:

cd %GOPATH%\src\code.google.com\p\go.talks\2013
present

visit http://127.0.0.1:3999/advconc, click `pingpong1.go` link:
404 page not found

pingpong1.go file url:
http://127.0.0.1:3999/advconc%5cpingpong1.go

we should use `/` instead of `%5c` on Windows(`%5c` is `\`).
